file.name: hardware-wallet-daemon.v0.1.0.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Hardware Wallet Daemon API
  description: This is the hardware-wallet-daemon API
  contact:
    email: steve@skycoin.net
  license:
    name: GPLv3
    url: 'https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html'
  version: 0.1.0
servers:
  - url: 'http://127.0.0.1:9510/api/v1'
paths:
  /csrf:
    get:
      description: Returns csrf token
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CSRFResponse'
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPErrorResponse'
  /generate_addresses:
    post:
      description: Generate addresses for the hardware wallet seed.
      requestBody:
        description: >-
          GenerateAddressesRequest is request data for
          /api/v1/generate_addresses
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/GenerateAddressesRequest'
        required: false
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GenerateAddressesResponse'
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPErrorResponse'
      security:
        - csrfAuth: []
  /apply_settings:
    post:
      description: Apply hardware wallet settings.
      requestBody:
        description: ApplySettingsRequest is request data for /api/v1/apply_settings
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApplySettingsRequest'
        required: false
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPSuccessResponse'
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPErrorResponse'
      security:
        - csrfAuth: []
  /backup:
    post:
      description: Start seed backup procedure.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPSuccessResponse'
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPErrorResponse'
      security:
        - csrfAuth: []
  /cancel:
    put:
      description: Cancels the current operation.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPSuccessResponse'
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPErrorResponse'
      security:
        - csrfAuth: []
  /check_message_signature:
    post:
      description: Check a message signature matches the given address.
      requestBody:
        description: >-
          CheckMessageSignatureRequest is request data for
          /api/v1/check_message_signature
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/CheckMessageSignatureRequest'
        required: false
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPSuccessResponse'
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPErrorResponse'
      security:
        - csrfAuth: []
  /features:
    get:
      description: Returns device information.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/FeaturesResponse'
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPErrorResponse'
      security:
        - csrfAuth: []
  /firmware_update:
    put:
      description: Update firmware
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPSuccessResponse'
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPErrorResponse'
      security:
        - csrfAuth: []
  /recovery:
    post:
      description: Recover existing wallet using seed.
      requestBody:
        description: RecoveryRequest is request data for /api/v1/recovery
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/RecoveryRequest'
        required: false
      responses:
        '200':
          description: intermediate response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPSuccessResponse'
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPErrorResponse'
      security:
        - csrfAuth: []
  /generate_mnemonic:
    post:
      description: >-
        Generate mnemonic can be used to initialize the device with a random
        seed.
      requestBody:
        description: GenerateMnemonicRequest is request data for /api/v1/generate_mnemonic
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/GenerateMnemonicRequest'
        required: false
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPSuccessResponse'
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPErrorResponse'
      security:
        - csrfAuth: []
  /set_mnemonic:
    post:
      description: Set mnemonic can be used to initialize the device with your own seed.
      requestBody:
        description: SetMnemonicRequest is request data for /api/v1/set_mnemonic
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SetMnemonicRequest'
        required: false
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPSuccessResponse'
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPErrorResponse'
      security:
        - csrfAuth: []
  /configure_pin_code:
    post:
      description: Configure a pin code on the device.
      requestBody:
        description: ConfigurePinCodeRequest is request data for /api/v1/configure_pin_code
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ConfigurePinCodeRequest'
        required: false
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPSuccessResponse'
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPErrorResponse'
      security:
        - csrfAuth: []
  /sign_message:
    post:
      description: Sign a message using the secret key at given index.
      requestBody:
        description: SignMessageRequest is request data for /api/v1/sign_message
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SignMessageRequest'
        required: false
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SignMessageResponse'
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPErrorResponse'
      security:
        - csrfAuth: []
  /transaction_sign:
    post:
      description: Sign a transaction with the hardware wallet.
      requestBody:
        description: TransactionSignRequest is request data for /api/v1/transactionSign
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/TransactionSignRequest'
        required: false
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPSuccessResponse'
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPErrorResponse'
      security:
        - csrfAuth: []
  /wipe:
    delete:
      description: clean all the configurations.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPSuccessResponse'
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPErrorResponse'
      security:
        - csrfAuth: []
  /available:
    get:
      description: check whether a skywallet is connected to the machine.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  data:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: boolean
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPErrorResponse'
      security:
        - csrfAuth: []
  /version:
    get:
      description: Returns daemon version information.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VersionResponse'
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPErrorResponse'
      security:
        - csrfAuth: []
  /intermediate/pin_matrix:
    post:
      description: pin matrix ack request.
      requestBody:
        description: PinMatrixRequest is request data for /api/v1/intermediate/pin_matrix
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/PinMatrixRequest'
        required: false
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPSuccessResponse'
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPErrorResponse'
      security:
        - csrfAuth: []
  /intermediate/passphrase:
    post:
      description: passphrase ack request.
      requestBody:
        description: PassPhraseRequest is request data for /api/v1/intermediate/passphrase
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/PassphraseRequest'
        required: false
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPSuccessResponse'
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPErrorResponse'
      security:
        - csrfAuth: []
  /intermediate/word:
    post:
      description: word ack request.
      requestBody:
        description: WordRequest is request data for /api/v1/intermediate/word
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/WordRequest'
        required: false
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPSuccessResponse'
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPErrorResponse'
      security:
        - csrfAuth: []
  /intermediate/button:
    post:
      description: button ack request.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPSuccessResponse'
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPErrorResponse'
      security:
        - csrfAuth: []
components:
  schemas:
    TransactionSignRequest:
      required:
        - transaction_inputs
        - transaction_outputs
      type: object
      properties:
        transaction_inputs:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/TransactionInput'
        transaction_outputs:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/TransactionOutput'
    WordRequest:
      required:
        - word
      type: object
      properties:
        word:
          type: string
    TransactionOutput:
      required:
        - address
        - address_index
        - coins
        - hours
      type: object
      properties:
        address_index:
          type: integer
        address:
          type: string
        coins:
          type: string
        hours:
          type: string
    VersionResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        data:
          type: object
          properties:
            commit:
              type: string
            version:
              type: string
            branch:
              type: string
    SetMnemonicRequest:
      required:
        - mnemonic
      type: object
      properties:
        mnemonic:
          type: string
          example: >-
            cloud flower upset remain green metal below cup stem infant art
            thank
    ConfigurePinCodeRequest:
      required:
        - remove_pin
      type: object
      properties:
        remove_pin:
          type: boolean
    CheckMessageSignatureRequest:
      required:
        - address
        - message
        - signature
      type: object
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
          example: Hello World
        signature:
          type: string
          example: >-
            6ebd63dd5e57cad07b6d229e96b5d2ac7d1bec1466d2a95bd200c21be6a0bf194b5ad5123f6e37c6393ee3635b38b938fcd91bbf1327fc957849a9e5736f6e4300
        address:
          type: string
          example: 2EU3JbveHdkxW6z5tdhbbB2kRAWvXC2pLzw
    GenerateAddressesRequest:
      required:
        - address_n
      type: object
      properties:
        address_n:
          type: integer
          example: 2
        start_index:
          type: integer
          example: 1
        confirm_address:
          type: boolean
          example: false
    SignMessageResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        data:
          type: string
    PinMatrixRequest:
      required:
        - pin
      type: object
      properties:
        pin:
          type: string
    TransactionInput:
      required:
        - hash
        - index
      type: object
      properties:
        index:
          type: integer
        hash:
          type: string
    GenerateAddressesResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        data:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
    GenerateMnemonicRequest:
      required:
        - word_count
      type: object
      properties:
        word_count:
          type: integer
          example: 32
        use_passphrase:
          type: boolean
          example: false
    TransactionSignResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        data:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
    FeaturesResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        data:
          required:
            - firmware_features
            - fw_major
            - fw_minor
            - fw_patch
            - initialized
            - needs_backup
            - passphrase_cached
            - passphrase_protection
            - pin_cached
            - pin_protection
            - vendor
          type: object
          properties:
            firmware_features:
              type: integer
            device_id:
              type: string
            passphrase_protection:
              type: boolean
            label:
              type: string
            fw_patch:
              type: integer
            fw_major:
              type: integer
            fw_minor:
              type: integer
            minor_version:
              type: integer
            pin_protection:
              type: boolean
            bootloader_hash:
              type: string
            major_version:
              type: integer
            pin_cached:
              type: boolean
            vendor:
              type: string
            needs_backup:
              type: boolean
            initialized:
              type: boolean
            model:
              type: string
            passphrase_cached:
              type: boolean
            patch_version:
              type: integer
    RecoveryRequest:
      required:
        - use_passphrase
        - word_count
      type: object
      properties:
        word_count:
          type: integer
          example: 32
        use_passphrase:
          type: boolean
          example: false
        dry_run:
          type: boolean
          example: false
    PassphraseRequest:
      required:
        - passphrase
      type: object
      properties:
        passphrase:
          type: string
    CSRFResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        data:
          type: string
    HTTPErrorResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        error:
          type: object
          properties:
            code:
              type: integer
            message:
              type: string
    ApplySettingsRequest:
      required:
        - use_passphrase
      type: object
      properties:
        label:
          type: string
          example: foo
        use_passphrase:
          type: boolean
          example: false
        language:
          type: string
          example: english
    SignMessageRequest:
      required:
        - address_n
        - message
      type: object
      properties:
        address_n:
          type: integer
          example: 2
        message:
          type: string
          example: Hello World!
    HTTPSuccessResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        data:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
  securitySchemes:
    csrfAuth:
      type: apiKey
      name: X-CSRF-TOKEN
      in: header
